column2: #| fig-cap: "Indifference curves between income and liberal values. Our indifference curves were constructed by laying contour lines over a 7 by 4 matrix, where rows correspond to our constructed index of liberalism and columns are a profileâ€™s income, while matrix values are differences in selection probabilities for a profile with any combination of the two qualities in comparison to the median profile (income = 3, index = 3)."
